snippet: Atherosclerosis — considered an illness of a modern, inactive lifestyle — was discovered in the remains of people from various ancient cultures.
lead_paragraph: Atherosclerosis — considered an illness of a modern, inactive lifestyle — was discovered in the remains of people from various ancient cultures.

headline.seo: CT Scans Find Vascular Disease in Ancient Mummies
headline.main: CT Scans Find Vascular Disease in Ancient Mummies
